name: ORDER_INSTRUCTIONS
description: This table holds information regarding any order instructions specified for an order. The information is extracted from Order Instructions (I ORD 240) item which uses the category list stored in the Order Instructions Old (I EPT 18211) item.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORDER_INSTR_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value from EPT 18211 to specify order instructions.
